mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_COMMUNITY_POST(TITLE, CONTENT, USER_ID, CATEGORY_CODE, CREATED_DATE) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{userId}, #{categoryCode}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_COMMUNITY_POST SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, UPDATED_DATE = NOW() WHERE POST_ID = #{postId}
mapper.select:
SELECT p.POST_ID, p.TITLE, p.CONTENT, p.USER_ID, p.CREATED_DATE, p.UPDATED_DATE, p.CATEGORY_CODE, p.VIEW_COUNT,
u.USER_NICKNAME, ( SELECT COUNT(l.POST_ID) FROM TB_COMMUNITY_LIKE l WHERE l.POST_ID = p.POST_ID ) AS LIKE_COUNT, p.IS_DELETED, p.CREATED_BY, p.UPDATED_BY FROM TB_COMMUNITY_POST p LEFT JOIN TB_USER u ON p.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE p.POST_ID = #{postId}
